channel.title: How to make a ranged weapon?
channel.description:
Ok I've finished adding the emotes for the cannon and the stats and everything ... the only problem is now I need to make it into a ranged weapon instead of a melee weapon ...
Does anyone know how to make a hand cannon into a ranged weapon that requires cannonballs for ammo? thx
